title: Ticket #6588: collector python plugins break collector logging on reconfig
description:
When the python plugin module is loaded as a Collector plugin, it resets the Collectors SUBSYSTEM value to tool. This causes the Collector to start writing to the ToolLog instead of the CollectorLog after the first reconfig.

The reason for this is that a static constructor in the HTCondor binding unconditionally calls set_MySubSystem("TOOL", SUBSYSTEM_TYPE_TOOL)

This was initially noticed in an HTCondor CE at Fermi Lab.
